page.title: 14Leisure Activities
page.content: Quite a number of people in the Kennethmont area are actively involved with sporting activities such as horse riding, badminton, cycling, football, swimming, bowling, fishing, shooting, netball and golf. Many of the older people spend their spare time drinking in the pub or walking in the gardens at Leith Hall .Many women are members of the W.R.I. or the "Guild". Whist clubs are popular and so is gardening during the warmer months. A number of younger people are fond of highland dancing and playing musical instruments and many people have hobbies such as collecting stamps, photography,and looking after pet animals.Adults go to dances and discos held at Huntly and sometimes Insch. Probably the most of our spare time is spent watching television.
